sqlMap.select: select member_id, name, pass, phone, email, address, nickname, introduction, birthday, charging_amount from member where member_id=#member_id#

sqlMap.select: select auction_board_num, main_image_path, title, highest_price, end_date, hot_check from (select auction_board_num,main_image_path,title,highest_price,end_date,hot_check, rownum rn from (select auction_board_num,main_image_path,title,highest_price,end_date,hot_check from auction a, basket b where a.auction_board_num=b.board_num and b.member_id=#member_id#) ) where rn between #start# and #end#
